item.title: Books
item.content:encoded:
Books

Books I will read.

Next

  • The Power of Myth (Joseph Campbell)
  • Dune (Frank Herbert)

To Read

Nonfiction

Must
  • Skin in the Game (Nassim Taleb)
  • Meditations (Marcus Aurelius, Gregory Hays translation)
  • The 48 Laws of Power (Robert Greene)
  • History of the Peloponnesian War (Thucydides)
  • Lives (Plutarch)
  • Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind (Yuval Noah Harari)
  • The Power of Myth (Joseph Campbell)
  • The Art of War (Sun Tzu)
Backburner
  • How to Live: Or a Life of Montaigne in One Question and Twenty Attempts at an Answer (Sarah Bakewall)
  • The Big Picture (Sean Carroll)
  • What Makes Sammy Run? (Budd Schulberg)
  • Man’s Search for Meaning (Viktor Frankl)
  • Average is Over (Tyler Cowen)
  • Tao Te Ching (Lao Tzu)
  • Leadership: In Turbulent Times (Doris Goodwin)
  • Upheaval (Jared Diamond)
  • The Fabric of Reality (David Deutsch)
  • The Beginning of Infinity (David Deutsch)
  • God’s Debris (Scott Adams)
  • The Rational Optimist (Matt Ridley)

Fiction

Must
  • Foundation (Isaac Asimov)
  • Neuromancer (William Gibson)
  • Dune (Frank Herbert)
  • Last and First Men (Olaf Stapledon)
Backburner
  • Gardens of the Moon (Steven Erikson)
  • Cloud Atlas (David Mitchell)
  • Snowcrash (Neal Stephenson)
  • The Forever War (Joe Haldeman)

Read

Nonfiction

PrinciplesRay Dalio⭐️
The Ride of a LifetimeBob Iger⭐️

Fiction

Ready Player OneErnest Cline👍
ArmadaErnest Cline👎
Inherit the StarsJames P. Hogan👍
The Gentle Giants of GanymedeJames P. Hogan👍
Giants' StarJames P. Hogan👍
Cibola BurnJames S.A. Corey👍
The Little PrinceAntoine de Saint-Exupéry👍
Die Glücklichen Inseln hinter dem WindeJames Krüss👍
The 13½ Lives of Captain BluebearWalter Moers⭐️
The City of Dreaming BooksWalter Moers⭐️
Warrior CatsErin Hunter👍

Reading

Zen in the Art of WritingRay Bradbury
Nemesis Games (The Expanse, Book 5)James S.A. Corey
Atomic HabitsJames Clear
The Compound EffectDarren Hardy
